function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Continuous operation of toilet exhaust system","Impact":"Potential spread of airborne viruses if exhaust system is not functioning properly.","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and inspection of exhaust system to ensure proper functioning.","Technologies":"Air quality sensors, exhaust fan monitoring systems.","People":"Building maintenance staff, occupants of the building.","Owner":"Building management, facility management team."},{"Description":"Closing the toilet window to maintain negative pressure","Impact":"Loss of negative pressure leading to potential spread of airborne viruses from the toilet.","Mitigation":"Installation of automated window control systems to ensure proper window closure.","Technologies":"Smart windows, automated window actuators.","People":"Building maintenance staff, occupants of the building.","Owner":"Building management, facility management team."},{"Description":"Temperature and humidity control","Impact":"Inappropriate temperature and humidity levels can impact the defensive efficacy of the oral mucous membrane, increasing the risk of virus transmission.","Mitigation":"Use of HVAC systems to control temperature and humidity within recommended ranges, regular monitoring of temperature and humidity levels.","Technologies":"HVAC systems with temperature and humidity control, smart thermostats.","People":"Building occupants, maintenance staff.","Owner":"Building management, facility management team."}]}
